body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean County } Sct

I Douglas Little presiding Judge for McLean county Ky. do hereby certify that Edward R. Weir Jr. Captain Personally ^Personally^ appeared before me and took the following oath I Edward R. Weir do solemnly swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States and the constitution of Kentucky And will discharge all and singular the duties and services appertaining to the office of Captain in the Volunteer company Militia agreeably to the law and general regulations and will obey such orders and instructions And shall from time to time receive from the proper officers, Which is hereby certified to general head quarters
Given under my hand this 23rd day of November 1861 at Calhoon Ky

Douglass Little
P. J. McLean County
